meanings.definition: A fact or condition connected with or relevant to an event or action.
meanings.sent1: In that circumstance, we had to cancel the picnic due to the rain.
meanings.sent2: The circumstance of the car breaking down made us late for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Despite the circumstance of the power outage, we managed to have a fun game night by candlelight.
meanings.sent4: Under the circumstance of the storm, the trees swayed violently in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The circumstance of the fire alarm going off during the test caused quite a commotion in the classroom.
